Allow me to lay out the FACTS in regards to this rip.

-  Extremezone did not encode this rip, it is the LTW rip relabeled.  

-  The LTW rip is infact NOT a dvd, but some sort or workprint/screener.

-  The quality IS below, that of a standard dvdrip.  (dark picture with less than perfect audio)

Now I am sure there will be a boatload of you that will bash me for typing this, but let me make it clear, this is NOT complaining.  I am stating facts to help some of you newer users learn.  

Like it or lump it, these are the facts people.
